src: 「我們有 4 個月大曾經罹患糖尿病老鼠現在沒有糖尿病了」他補充道。
mt: "We have 4-month-old diabetic mice that are now not diabetic," he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: 位於新斯科舍省哈利法克斯的戴爾豪斯大學醫學教授、加拿大糖尿病協會臨床及科學部門主席埃胡德·烏爾 (Ehud Ur) 醫師警告說，此研究仍在初期階段。
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a medical professor at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and chair of the clinical and scientific department of the Canadian Diabetes Association, warns that the research is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: 如同其他專家，他對糖尿病是否可以治癒存疑，並指出這些發現與已經患有第一型糖尿病的人無關。
mt: As with other experts, he doubts whether diabetes can be cured and points out that these findings are unrelated to people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: 瑞典學院諾貝爾文學委員會常任秘書莎拉．戴紐斯，週一在瑞典的瑞典廣播電台節目中公開表示，委員會因為無法直接與巴布．狄倫聯繫領取 2016 年諾貝爾文學獎事宜，已放棄嘗試。
mt: 2016 Nobel Literature Prize winner Bob Dylan has been awarded the prize for having "created new poetic expressions within the great American song tradition" and "been an outstanding performer for more than 50 years," the Swedish Academy said in a statement.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: 戴紐斯說：「現在我們什麼都不做。我打過電話、也寄了電子郵件給他最親近的合作夥伴，也收到很友善的回覆。就現在來說，那樣的確就夠了。」
mt: "Right now we're doing nothing. I've called and emailed his closest collaborators, and I've gotten very friendly responses. For now, that's enough," Daines said.
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: 在此之前，鈴響公司的執行長傑米·西米諾夫曾說過他之所以創立該公司，是因為他在自家車庫改裝的店面聽不到前門的按鈴聲。
mt: Before that, Jamie Siminoff, the founder of Ring, said he started the company because he couldn't hear the doorbell in his garage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: 他說他做了一個無線網路門鈴。
mt: He said he made a wireless doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: 西米諾夫表示當他 2013 年在《創業鯊魚幫》節目上露面後，銷售額提高了，當時節目評審拒絕投資這個新創公司。
mt: Westminoff said sales increased after he appeared on the Shark Tank show in 2013, when the show's judges refused to invest in the new company.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: 在 2017 年末，西米諾夫出現在 QVC 購物頻道 上。
mt: 2017年末，西米諾夫出現在 QVC 購物頻道上。
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring 也與保安產業的競爭對手 ADT 公司達成訴訟和解。
mt: Ring also settled a lawsuit with its security industry rival ADT.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: 儘管有一種實驗性的疫苗顯示能降低伊波拉病毒的致死率，但到目前為止，沒有藥物明確證實適合治療已受感染的人。
mt: Although an experimental vaccine has shown to reduce the mortality rate of Ebola virus, no drug has been proven to be effective in treating infected people.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: 其中一種抗體雞尾酒 ZMapp，起初很可望在實務上帶來好消息，但正式研究指出，它的效果並未達到預防死亡的預期目標。
mt: One of the cocktails of antibodies, ZMapp, initially looked promising in practice, but formal research showed that it did not meet the expected target of preventing death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: ZMapp 在 PALM 試驗中作為對照組，代表科學家將其視為基準，與其他三種治療方法相比較。
mt: ZMapp was used as a control in the PALM trial, meaning scientists considered it a baseline to compare with the other three treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: 美國體操協會為美國奧委會的來信背書，並認同奧林匹克大家庭絕對有需要為我們所有的運動員推動安全的環境。
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association backs up the letter to the U.S. Olympic Committee and recognizes that the Olympic family absolutely needs to push for a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: 我們同意美國奧委會的聲明，也就是我們的選手、團隊和其運動項目的利益，會因為我們組織內具有意義的改革而改善，而非取消資格。
mt: We agree with the statement of the USOC, that our athletes, teams and sports will improve, not be disqualified, because of our organization's meaningful reforms.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: 美國體操協會支持一項獨立調查，這項調查可能有助於釐清，在賴瑞·納薩爾事件中倖存下來的人提起勇氣描述的虐待內容，長期以來無人發現的原因，且會引入任何必需且妥當的調整。
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association supports an independent investigation that may help clarify the reasons why the abuse described by those who survived the Larry Nassar case was not discovered for so long and will introduce any necessary and appropriate adjustments.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: 美國體操協會和美國奧委會擁有相同的目標，也就是讓體操和其他運動儘可能安全，讓運動員得以在安全、正向和擁有自主權的環境中，追尋自己的夢想。
mt: The U.S. Gymnastics Association and the U.S. Olympic Committee share the same goal, which is to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible, allowing athletes to pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and self-determined environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: 整個 1960 年代，布里辛斯基擔任過約翰．甘迺迪的顧問及林登．詹森的幕僚。
mt: 1960s, he served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy and as a staff member to Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: 1976 年的選舉中，他對卡特的外交政策提出建議，其後在 1977 至 1981 年間，接替亨利·季辛吉擔任國家安全顧問 (NSA)。
mt: 1976 election, he advised Carter's foreign policy, and served as NSA from 1977 to 1981.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: 作為美國國家安全局的一員，他在外交上協助卡特處理世界事務，例如 1978 年的大衛營協議；1970 年代後期為美中關係正常化出謀劃策；1979 年引發伊朗人質危機的伊朗革命；和 1979 年蘇聯入侵阿富汗。
mt: As a member of the National Security Council, he helped Carter deal with world affairs, such as the 1978 Camp David Accords; the normalization of U.S.-China relations in the late 1970s; the 1979 Iranian Revolution that led to the Iran hostage crisis; and the 1979 Soviet invasion of Afghanistan.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: 這部電影由雷恩·葛斯林和艾瑪·史東主演，並獲得所有主要獎項的提名。
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated for all major awards.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: 雷恩‧葛斯林和艾瑪‧史東分別獲提名為最佳男主角和最佳女主角。
mt: Leonardo DiCaprio and Emma Stone were nominated for best actor and best actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: 其他提名包括最佳影片、最佳導演、最佳攝影、最佳服裝設計、最佳剪輯、最佳原創音樂、最佳製作設計、最佳音效剪輯、最佳混音及最佳原著劇本獎。
mt: Other nominees include best picture, best director, best cinematography, best costume design, best editing, best original music score, best production design, best sound editing, best sound mixing and best original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: 電影中的兩首歌曲〈Audition (The Fools Who Dream)〉和〈 City of Stars〉提名最佳原創歌曲。獅門影視總共提名 26 個獎項，傲視其他電影工作室。
mt: The film's two songs, "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars," are nominated for best original song. Lionsgate has 26 nominations, more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: 星期日傍晚，美國總統唐納‧川普透過新聞秘書發表聲明，宣布美國軍隊將撤離敘利亞。
mt: On Sunday evening, U.S. President Donald Trump announced through his press secretary that U.S. troops will be withdrawn from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: 川普與土耳其總統艾爾多安通過電話後便發表這則聲明。
mt: The statement was issued after Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: 該聲明表示，土耳其也將負責看守遭囚禁的伊斯蘭國 (ISIS) 成員，歐洲眾國拒將那些成員遣送回國。
mt: The statement said Turkey would also be responsible for guarding ISIS members who are being held, as European countries refuse to repatriate them.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: 這不僅證明了一個廣泛流傳的理論，認為至少某些恐龍有羽毛，也提供了大部分化石無法提供的細節，例如顏色和立體組成方式。
mt: This not only proves a widely held theory that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, but also provides details that most fossils cannot, such as color and three-dimensional composition.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: 科學家說這種動物的羽毛外層是栗棕色，內層是泛白的顏色或胡蘿蔔色。
mt: Scientists say the feathers of this animal are reddish-brown on the outside and white or carrot-colored on the inside.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: 該發現也為鳥類羽毛的進化提供深入的見解。
mt: The discovery also sheds new light on the evolution of bird feathers.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: 因為恐龍的羽毛缺乏發展健全的軸，所謂羽軸，但確實存在其他羽毛特性，即羽枝與羽小枝，因此研究者推論，這些其他特性後來很可能就進化成了羽軸。
mt: Because the feathers of dinosaurs lacked the fully developed shaft, known as the rachis, but did have other feather characteristics, such as the ramus and ramulus, researchers hypothesize that these other features later evolved into the rachis.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: 這些羽毛的結構顯示它們不是用來飛行而是用來調節溫度或展示的。研究人員表示，即使這是年輕恐龍的尾巴，該樣本也顯示其為成熟羽毛而非幼雛絨毛。
mt: The structure of these feathers shows they were not used for flight but for temperature regulation or display. Researchers say even if this is a young dinosaur's tail, the specimen shows mature feathers, not downy natal down.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: 研究人員認為，儘管這是一頭年輕恐龍的尾巴，但樣本中的羽毛已完全發育，而不是年幼動物的新生毛。
mt: Researchers say, although the tail of the young dinosaur, the feathers have fully developed, not the new born animal's new.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: 昨天早上在土耳其加濟安泰普警察總部引爆的汽車炸彈，造成兩名員警死亡以及超過二十位民眾受傷。
mt: 2 police officers were killed and over 20 civilians were injured when a car bomb exploded outside the Gaziantep police headquarters on Monday morning.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: 省長辦公室表示傷患中有十九名是警察。
mt: 19 of the injured were police officers, according to the provincial governor's office.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: 警方說，他們懷疑這起攻擊是由達伊沙（伊拉克和黎凡特伊斯蘭國）的好戰嫌疑犯所為。
mt: Police say they suspect the attack was carried out by Daish (Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant) militants.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: 他們發現太陽的運作與其他恆星的基本原理相同：系統中所有恆星的活動均受其光度、自轉所推動，就是這麼簡單。
mt: They found that the sun's operation is based on the same basic principles as other stars: all the activity of the system is driven by its luminosity and rotation, that's all.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: 恆星的羅士比數跟電漿的流動有關，必須以光度和自轉來判斷。
mt: The stellar rotation rate is related to the plasma flow, and must be determined by brightness and rotation.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: 羅士比數越小，星體在磁場逆轉方面就越不活躍。
mt: The more massive a star is, the less active it is in terms of magnetic field reversals.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: 在他的旅程中，岩崎圭一碰過不少麻煩。
mt: In his journey, Keiichi Iwazaki had a lot of trouble.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: 他被海盜搶劫、在西藏被一隻患有狂犬病的狗攻擊、在尼泊爾逃離了一場婚姻，並在印度被逮捕。
mt: He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped a marriage in Nepal, and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11n 標準可在 2.4Ghz 和 5.0Ghz 頻率上運作。
mt: 802.11n can operate on both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: 如果基地台擁有雙射頻，這將使其向下兼容於 802.11a、802.11b 和 802.11g。
mt: 802.11n devices will be able to interoperate with 802.11a, 802.11b, and 802.11g devices.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 802.11n 的速度比過去的設備都要快非常多，理論上最高傳輸量可達每秒 600Mbit。
mt: 802.11n is much faster than previous equipment, with a theoretical maximum transfer rate of 600 Mbit per second.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: 已婚且育有兩名成年子女的杜瓦爾，並沒有給與故事有關的米勒留下深刻的印象。
mt: The married father of two adult children, Duvall, did not leave Miller with a lasting impression.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: 當米勒被要求發表評論時，他表示：「麥克在聽證會上說了很多……我那時正在做準備，所以其實沒聽到他說了什麼。」
mt: When asked to comment, Miller said, "MacKay said a lot at the hearing... I was preparing at the time, so I didn't hear what he said."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: 胡錦濤表示：「我們將致力於 2020 年以前，大幅降低 2005 年的單位國內生產毛額每個單位的溫室氣體排放量水準。」
mt: Hu Jintao said, "We will work to reduce greenhouse gas emissions per unit of gross domestic product by 2020 to levels 40 percent below those of 2005."
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: 他沒有設定減少的數量，只聲稱將依據中國的經濟產出進行削減。
mt: He did not specify the number of reductions, only that they would be based on China's economic output.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: 胡錦濤鼓勵發展中的國家「避免先汙染、後清理的老路」。
mt: Hu Jintao urged developing countries to "avoid the old path of first polluting and then cleaning up."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: 他補充道：「然而，不應該要求他們承擔超出其發展階段、責任和能力的義務。」
mt: "However, they should not be asked to take on responsibilities that are beyond their development stage, capacity and capability," he added.
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: 伊拉克研究小組在今天格林威治標準時間 12 點提出報告。
mt: 12:00 UTC, an Iraqi research group submitted a report.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: 它警告說，沒人能保證此時在伊拉克採取的任何行動方針將阻止宗派戰爭、持續成長的暴力或陷入混亂。
mt: It warns that no one can guarantee that any course of action taken in Iraq at this time will prevent sectarian war, the continued growth of violence, or a descent into chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: 此報告開頭先請求美國針對中東政策進行公開辯論並形成共識。
mt: The report begins by requesting that the United States publicly debate and reach consensus on its Middle East policy.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: 此報告大力抨擊了行政機構現行對伊拉克政策的幾乎所有面向，並強烈主張立即改變方向。
mt: The report strongly criticizes almost every aspect of the current administration's policy toward Iraq and strongly advocates an immediate change of course.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: 在其中 78 個建議，第一個就是應在今年年底前採行新的外交措施，以保護伊拉克的邊境免受敵國侵擾，並重建與其鄰國的外交關係。
mt: 78 recommendations, the first of which is to implement new diplomatic measures by the end of the year to protect Iraq's borders from foreign aggression and rebuild diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: 現任參議員、阿根廷第一夫人克莉絲汀娜‧費南德茲‧德基希納，昨晚在距離布宜諾斯艾利斯 50 公里（31 英里）的拉普拉塔市，宣布參選總統。
mt: Current Senator and First Lady of Argentina, Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, announced her candidacy for president last night in La Plata, 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: 德基西納夫人在阿根廷劇院宣佈有意競選總統，這裡也是她在 2005 年投入參議院選戰、欲成為布宜諾斯艾利斯省代表團一員時的起點。
mt: In a theater in Argentina, Mrs. de Kirchner announced her intention to run for president, a place where she also started her campaign in 2005 to become a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: 卡崔娜颶風發生之後，有關救濟與重建支出的爭議引發討論；一些財政保守派人士幽默地將其稱為「布希的紐奧良交易」。
mt: 2005's Hurricane Katrina and the ensuing debate over relief and rebuilding costs led to discussions about the "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: 自由派對推動重建的批評，主要在於重建合約犒賞了一般認為的華府圈內人。
mt: The criticism of the deal by the left is mainly that the contract rewards the Washington insiders.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: 超過四百萬人到羅馬參加葬禮。
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: 出席人數眾多，因此不是每個人都能進入聖伯多祿廣場參加葬禮。
mt: 由于参加人数众多，圣伯多禄广场不可能容纳所有人参加葬礼。
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: 羅馬各處架設了幾面巨型電視螢幕，讓人民觀看儀式。
mt: Large screens were set up in various parts of Rome for the people to watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: 許多義大利城市和世界上其他地方也有類似的陳設，尤其是波蘭，並有為數眾多的人潮前來觀禮。
mt: Many Italian cities and other parts of the world have similar displays, especially Poland, and there are many people coming to pay tribute.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: 歷史學家曾經批評，過去聯邦調查局的政策是將資源集中在容易解決的案件，尤其是汽車失竊案，目的是要提高該機構的成功率。
mt: Historians have criticized the agency's past policy of concentrating resources on easily solved cases, especially car thefts, in order to boost its success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: 美國國會從 2005 財政年度開始撥款給猥褻防治措施，並要求聯邦調查局指派十名探員處理成人色情案件。
mt: 2005 fiscal year, the U.S. Congress began to allocate funds for the prevention of obscenity, and the Federal Bureau of Investigation assigned ten investigators to deal with adult pornography cases.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: 羅賓·烏特帕創下球局最高分，僅以 41 球便完成 70 次跑位，打下 11 個四分與 2 個六分。
mt: Robin Uthappa set a new record for the highest score in a single over, completing 70 runs in 41 balls, hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: 中間棒次擊球手薩辛・坦都卡和拉胡爾・德拉維德表現出色，攜手合作之下得分來到了100分。
mt: Middle order batsmen Saseen Tanduka and Lahiru Della Vid tabled a fine performance, scoring 100 runs together.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: 但是，在失去隊長的三柱門後，印度只獲得 36 分和失去 7 個三柱門，球局便結束了。
mt: But after losing their captain, India only scored 36 points and lost 7 three-pointers, and the game ended.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: 美國總統喬治·W·布希在 11 月 16 日早晨抵達新加坡，開始為期一週的亞洲之旅。
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore early on November 16 for a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: 由新加坡副總理黃根成迎接，並與新加坡總理李顯龍商談貿易和恐怖主義等議題。
mt: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Teo Chee Hean and discussed trade and terrorism with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: 期中選舉失利的一週後，布希告訴聽眾將於亞洲擴大貿易一事。
mt: One week after his midterm election losses, Bush told his audience that he would expand trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: 在周二與新民主黨領導人傑克‧林頓於總理辦公室進行 25 分鐘會晤後，總理史蒂芬‧哈珀同意將政府的《空氣潔淨法》送交由所有黨派組成的委員會審核，再進行二讀。
mt: 25 minutes after meeting with New Democratic Party leader Jack Layton in the prime minister's office on Tuesday, Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the government's Clean Air Act to a committee of all parties for review before a second reading.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: 雷頓在與總理的會面中，請求修改保守黨的環境法案，要求「全面徹底改寫」保守黨所提的環境法案。
mt: Leighton asked for a rewrite of the Conservative Party's environmental bill, asking for a "complete and thorough rewrite" of the Conservative Party's environmental bill.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: 默西醫院位於塔斯馬尼亞州德文波特，自從聯邦政府介入接管該醫院的資助事宜，州政府及部分聯邦議會成員即批評該舉係為 11 月聯邦選舉序幕的噱頭。
mt: The Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, has been criticized by the state government and some federal parliamentarians since the federal government took over the funding of the hospital, as a stunt for the November federal election.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: 但總理約翰·霍華德表示，該法案只是為了保護醫院的設施不被塔斯馬尼亞政府降級，為此撥出額外的 4,500 萬澳幣。
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the bill was only to protect hospital facilities from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, for which an additional $450 million was allocated.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: 依據最新公告，海平面讀數顯示有海嘯發生。帕果帕果及紐埃附近有明確的海嘯活動紀錄。
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicate a tsunami has occurred. There are clear tsunami observations in the vicinity of Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: 東加並未回報任何重大損壞或傷亡，但據稱暫時的電力中斷妨礙了東加相關單位接收太平洋海嘯警報中心 (PTWC) 發出之海嘯警報。
mt: Tonga has not reported any major damage or casualties, but it is said that the temporary power outage has hindered the Tonga-related units from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center (PTWC).
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: 儘管警告解除了，位於夏威夷海岸線上或附近的十四所學校仍然全數在星期三全日停課。
mt: 14 schools along or near the coast of Hawaii were closed for the entire day on Wednesday, despite the cancellation of the warning.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: 美國總統喬治·Ｗ·布希對此宣告事項表示支持。
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush expressed support for the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: 布希發言人戈登·喬翰羅將朝鮮的承諾稱為「達成朝鮮半島可核實無核化目標的一大步。」
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe called the North Korean commitment "a big step toward achieving a verified denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: 大西洋颶風季的第十個已命名颶風──亞熱帶暴風傑瑞──今日在大西洋上成形。
mt: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, Tropical Storm Jerry, formed today in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: 國家颶風中心 (NHC) 表示現在傑瑞颶風不會對陸地造成威脅。
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that Jerry will not threaten land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: 美軍工兵部隊預估 6 英吋的雨量便會沖毀先前受損的堤壩。
mt: 6 inches of rain is expected to wash away the levees that were damaged earlier.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: 卡崔娜颶風來襲時曾水淹高達二十英尺的第九區，目前水深及腰，附近的堤防沒入水中。
mt: 9th Ward, which was flooded up to 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is now up to the waist, with levees submerged.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: 水溢出堤防的範圍寬達一百英尺。
mt: The flood waters were up to 100 feet wide.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: 維基共享資源 (Commons) 管理師亞當‧庫爾登上個月向維基新聞 (Wikinews) 透露他對刪減的不滿。
mt: Commons administrator Adam Kotsotis told Wikinews last month that he was unhappy with the deletion.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: 「基本上他（威爾斯）從一開始就對我們撒謊。首先假裝這是出自法律考量；其次，假裝在聽我們說話，直到他的作品被刪除。」
mt: “He lied to us from the beginning. First pretending it was a legal issue; then pretending to listen to us until his work was removed.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: 該網站為數百萬個獲得公開許可的媒體提供服務，而社群的不滿促使相關單位目前正在努力為該網站起草一項關於性內容的政策。
mt: The site provides services to hundreds of millions of media with public permission, and the dissatisfaction of the community has prompted the relevant unit to currently work hard to draft a policy on sexual content for the site.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: 目前所做的研究主要都是理論上的，但此計畫的目的在於模擬對人馬座星系所做的觀察。
mt: The current research is mainly theoretical, but the purpose of this project is to simulate observations of the Andromeda galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: 該團隊想觀察到的效應，是由此星系與銀河各自之暗物質交互影響潮汐的結果
mt: The team was looking for the effect of the tidal interaction between the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the galaxy cluster.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: 正如同月亮對地球的引力造成潮汐一樣，銀河系也對射手座星系施加了作用力。
mt: Just as the moon's gravity causes tides on Earth, the Milky Way exerts a force on the Canis Major galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: 科學家能斷定暗物質用與一般物質相同的方式影響其他暗物質。
mt: Scientists can determine how dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way as ordinary matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: 該理論聲稱一個銀河系周圍的暗物質大多會形成一種暈圈，且是由許多微粒所組成。
mt: The theory claims that most of the dark matter around a galaxy will form a halo, and is made up of many particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: 電視報導顯示有白煙從核電廠中冒出。
mt: Television reports show white smoke coming out of the nuclear power plant.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: 地方政府警告該工廠附近的居民待在室內、關閉冷氣空調，且勿飲用自來水。
mt: Local authorities warned residents near the factory to stay indoors, close air conditioning and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: 日本政府核能機構表示已在核電廠找到放射性銫及碘。
mt: The Japanese government's nuclear agency says it has found radioactive cesium and iodine at the nuclear power plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: 有關當局推測，現場裝有鈾燃料的容器可能已經破裂並正在洩漏。
mt: Authorities suspect a container containing uranium fuel may have ruptured and is leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: 東尼·摩爾醫師 (Tony Moll) 在南非誇祖魯-納塔爾省發現了極具抗藥性的結核病（XDR-TB）。
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in South Africa's KwaZulu-Natal province.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: 他在一次訪問中表示，新的變異株「有極高的致死率，因此非常令人不安和恐慌」。
mt: He said in an interview that the new variant "has a very high mortality rate, so it is very alarming and frightening."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: 莫爾醫生認為有些病人可能是在醫院中感染上病菌，且至少有兩個病例為醫護人員。
mt: Dr. More said some patients may have contracted the infection in the hospital, and at least two cases were health care workers.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
